plot: A weasily little guy has a nightclub that is hemorrhaging money. He turns to a friend who turns him onto the idea of Sumo Sue and FLOW (the Fat Ladies Of Wrestling). Adult activities ensue.
title: Sumo Sue & the Fat Ladies of Wrestling
plot_es: A weasily little guy has a nightclub that is hemorrhaging money. He turns to a friend who turns him onto the idea of Sumo Sue and FLOW (the Fat Ladies Of Wrestling). Adult activities ensue.
original_name: Sumo Sue & the Fat Ladies of Wrestling
